actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the execution allowance for gain from the sale or exchange of a residence in the case of individuals 65 and over.

summary.text: Increases from $20,000 to $30,000 the exclusion allowance under the Internal Revenue Code for gain from the sale or exchange of a residence in the case of individuals 65 and over. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 121 (b) (1))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the execution allowance for gain from the sale or exchange of a residence in the case of individuals 65 and over.
